Subject: Appointment Letter


Dear {{doc.custom_employee_name}},


With reference to your application and subsequent interview, we are pleased to appoint you as   {{ employee.designation }} in the {{ employee.department }} department at {{doc.company}}. with effect from  {{ frappe.format_date(employee.date_of_joining,"dd-MM-yyyy") }} on the following terms and conditions:


  1. Your grade will be {{ doc.custom_salary_structure}} and your salary will be  {{doc.custom_salary_per_annum }}/- Per Annum. The breakup is provided in Annexure I.

  2. Your base location will be{% if employee.custom_work_location %} {% set address = frappe.get_doc("Address", employee.custom_work_location) %} {% if address.address_title %} {{ address.address_title }} {% endif %} {% endif %}. However, your work location will be on the sole discretion of the management. You may be posted in any other division in any other capacity or may be transferred to any department or branch offices of the Company or any other Company or subsidiary organization, if any, when formed or executed or any project undertaken by the Company, and you will submit to the regulations in force in that other establishments. You may be required to work in different shifts at the sole discretion of the Company.

  3. You will be on probation for a period of  {% set raw_months = employee.custom_probation_period / 30 %} {% set months = raw_months if raw_months % 1 else raw_months | int %} {{ months }} months months from the date of joining. In case of dissatisfactory performance, it can be extended for further period of 3 months or more; as per the discretion of management.

  4. In case of resignation, you can resign by giving  15’ notice in writing or 15 days salary in lieu thereof while on probation period and by giving {{employee.notice_number_of_days}} days’ notice in writing or {{employee.notice_number_of_days}} days Salary in lieu thereof while after confirmation. The management has the discretion to disallow notice pay and insist on serving the notice period, if the exigencies so warrant.The notice period will not be adjusted against any leaves accruing to you. It must be spent on duty. During notice period you are not allowed to participate in any legal discussion or any professional training.

  5. Either party can end / terminate the contract / association by giving the notice as per company’s policy or remuneration in lieu of such notice, except when the employment is terminated due to misconduct, non-adherence to company policies or unauthorized absence of more than 7 days.

  6. In the event of your leaving our company, you shall return all the documents, papers, company assets or any other proprietary information or any other electromagnetic media that rightfully belongs to the company to authorized person of the company.

  7. Continued absence for 7 days without legitimate purpose and express permission in writing of the management will tantamount to misconduct for which your service will be liable for termination after proper inquiry in the matter. In event that you abscond or leave the services of the company without proper notice as provided herein, the company will initiate legal proceedings against you and all costs/damages as a result of this action will be recovered from you.

  8. All proprietary information is sole property of the company, its assigns, and its customers and the company, shall be the sole owner of all the patents, copyrights, mask works, trade secrets and other rights in connection therewith. At all times, both during the employment by the company and after its termination, you will keep in confidence and trust all proprietary information, and will not use or disclose any proprietary information or anything directly relating to it without the written consent of the company, except as may be necessary in the ordinary course of performing your duties as an employee of the company.

  9. You will always maintain utmost confidentiality and shall not share any records, documents, technology processes, methods, or ideas with any of the person during and after your engagement with the company. You need to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement with us, in breach of that agreement management reserves the rights to act against you which may result in termination of your employment.

  10. Your individual remuneration is strictly confidential between you and the company. These details shall not be disclosed, divulged, or discussed by you with anybody else, except the company authorized persons. Your individual remuneration has been determined based on numerous factors such as your job, skills-specific background, and professional merit. Non-compliance of this clause may result in taking appropriate action against you. .

  11. You will obey the lawful commands and directions of your superior officers and to any department or branch offices of the company or any other company or subsidiary organization, if any, when formed or executed or any project undertaken by the company, and you will submit to the regulations in force in that other establishment.

  12. During your employment with the company, you will devote your time and attention exclusively to the duties entrusted to you and will not engage directly or indirectly or allow yourself to be engaged to work for any person, firm, or company in the capacity whatsoever, nor do any business without obtaining prior permission of the Director(s) of the company in writing. You will not, whether you are in the employment of the company or not, at any time(s), without the consent of the company in writing disclose, divulge or make public, except under legal obligations, accounts, transactions or dealings of the company which ought not to be disclosed, divulged or made public whether the same confided by you or become known to you in the course of your employment with the company or otherwise. This also includes not disclosing or divulging any project specific information, such as customer's name, training material and other company provided artifacts to any third party or on public forums or social networking sites.

  13. You shall not, for a period of thirty six months from the date you have ceased to be an employee of the company, accept any employment with or solicit any business or work from any organization, which has been either a customer or a client of the company. You shall not join as an employee/consultant in any organization that is working with the same client project for which you have worked during your employment with the company. In the event of a breach of this clause, the company will be entitled to the remedies of injunction, specific performance and other equitable relief, and no proof of special damages shall be necessary, and for the enforcement of these remedies, the expenses shall be borne by you.

  14. You have been engaged on the presumption that the information furnished by you in your application and resume are correct. In case, said are found to be incorrect or fake, your appointment with the company shall stand terminated without any notice.

  15. Your appointment and its continuance are subject to your being and remaining medically fit.

  16. You will keep us informed in writing of any change of your residential address and civil status, all the communication intended to be served upon you would be sent to you at your last given address and this shall be deemed to be sufficient service to you. .

  17. If at any time, in the opinion of the company which shall be final & binding, you are found guilty of dishonesty, disobedience, disorderly behavior, negligence, indiscipline, absence from duty without permission or any other conduct unbecoming of the status or the post you hold in the company, or of any other conduct considered by the company as detrimental to its interests or in violation of one or more terms & conditions of your employment, the company shall be entitled to forthwith terminate your employment.

  18. Your retirement from organization services shall be as per company’s Policy. This will be determined based on the date of birth as given at the time of joining the services of the company.

  19. You will be bound by all the existing rules & regulations of the company and to those that may be framed from time to time.

Kindly return to us the enclosed duplicate copy of this Appointment letter duly signed by you in token of your confirmation and acceptance of the above terms and conditions.


We look forward to a long and fruitful association.


Thanking you,

For, {{doc.company}}. Accepted On: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.appointment_date,"dd-MM-yyyy") }}
